He served as the Leader of the Opposition from 2019 to 2023. He has been a member of Syriza since 2013. He was Prime Minister of Greece from 2015 to 2019. Tsipras is a member of the Syriza party, and is a democratic socialist. A major issue of his term has been dealing with the Greek debt crisis. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Greece Category:Politicians from Athens Category:Foreign ministers of Greece
